<div class="typewriter">
  <h2>Hi, I'm Lennart!</h2>
</div>

I'm a PhD student and Research Associate at Bielefeld University's [Econometrics Group](https://www.uni-bielefeld.de/fakultaeten/wirtschaftswissenschaften/lehrbereiche/econometrics/).

In my spare time, you can find me [above the clouds](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c2vc8qY3B5c), on the tennis court, or in front of a chess board.

I use this website to share my [research](research.html), list my [talks](talks.html), and link to my [projects](projects.html).

You can download my CV [here](cv/oelschlaeger.pdf) and find a list of my publications [here](https://scholar.google.com/citations?hl=de&user=k9n1yt4AAAAJ).
